concept.title: Accessing the Marketing Cloud
concept.shortdesc: Accessing the Marketing Cloud involves linking or mapping your solution account with your Adobe ID. For example, in Analytics and Social, you can link (or map) the Company, Username, and Password values to your Adobe ID.

conbody.p: After you link your accounts, you can access all of your Adobe Digital Marketing products and services at <your company>.marketing.adobe.com.
conbody.note: Before you can join the Marketing Cloud, your must be provisioned by Adobe. Administrators, see .
conbody.p: After implementation and provisioning has occurred, you can link accounts by using the Join the Marketing Cloud wizard, or by getting access on the Organizations page.
